23.8a. [Haimo] Commentarium in Hoseam.
Commentary | Hosea
Manuscripts:
1. Albi, Bibliothèque municipale 31, f. 1r-41v. saec. ix. Full version.
2. Auxerre, Bibliothèque municipale 49, f. 19va-33vb. saec. xiii. Attributed to Remigius in MS. Short version. (S) *
3. Barcelona, Archivo capitular 64, f. 168rb-192vb. saec. xi-xii. Catalonia. No attribution in MS. Full version. *
4. Berlin, Staatsbibliothek – Preussischer Kulturbesitz, Theol. Lat. fol. 725 (Phillipps 413), f. 53v-114v. saec. xi (before 1058). O: western Germany; P: Mainz, Abtei Jakobsberg. No attribution in MS. Full version.*
5. Gent, Bibliotheek der Rijksuniversiteit 254, f. 1v-52v. saec. x.
6. Grenoble, Bibliothèque municipale  216 (237), f. 1ra-24rb. saec. xiii. Chartreux. No attribution in MS. Short version.(S) *
7. Grenoble, Bibliothèque municipale 310 (238), f. 1ra-17ra. saec. xiii. Chartreux. Attributed to Remigiius in MS. Short version. (S) *
8. Krakow (Berlin, Lat. Qu. 667 (Görres 3)), f. 1r-34r. saec. x-xi. Trier, St. Maximini. No attribution in MS. Full version.*
9. Nurnberg, V.26. 1446. Attributed to Heimo in MS. (S)
10. Paris, Bibliothèque national de France lat. 3000, f. 1r-24v. saec. xii. Attributed to Remigius in MS. Short version. (S)*
11. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale lat. 15313, f. 1va-14va. saec. xii. Attributed to Remigius in MS. Short version. (S)*
12. Pommersfelden, Schloss-Bibliothek 215, f. 1- saec. xiv inc. Attributed to Haimo in MS. (S)
13. Rimini, Biblioteca Gambalungha 116 (D.iv.189). saec. xviii.*
14. Stuttgart, Württembergische Landesbibliothek Theol. 2o 226, f. 1r-57v. saec. xii; Zweifalten. Attributed to Haimo in MS. Full version. *
15. Turin, Biblioteca Nazionale 531 (D V 17), f. 252v-288v. saec. xii. No attribution in MS. Full version.*
16. Trier, Priesterseminar 39, f. 1va-60rb. saec. xiii. Attributed to Haimo in MS. Full version.*
17. Troyes, Bibliothèque municipale 42, f. 1ra-14ra. saec. xii. Clairvaux. Attributed to Remigius
 in MS. Short version. (S)*
18. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica lat. 647, f. 1ra-37va. saec. xii4/4. Attributed to Remigius in MS. Short version. (S) *
